desc:
Designed & Developed a Website for company business using WordPress, WooCommerce, ACF
Maintaining & fixing bugs of exisiting websites

Designed front-end for components using JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, and SCSS
Designed SPA websites using React JS, Node JS
Designed & Developed website from UI using ACF, custom post type & Elementor

Engaged with clients to plan and optimize site issues and queries
Provided security maintenance and patching on the website interface to maintain viability after the launch
Created responsive WordPress website, WordPress customization, and Multi-vendor WooCommerce Website

Planned, created, and maintained websites for clients
Converted PSD/xd/Figma templates to responsive HTML template
Developed custom WordPress themes from scratch using PHP and MySQL
Worked with more than 100 clinets for developing their websites
